response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for contacting us regarding your recent experience with [product/service]. I sincerely apologize that we have not been able to resolve this issue to your satisfaction. 

In order to ensure your concerns receive the full attention they deserve, I am escalating your case to our [relevant department, e.g. Technical Support, Billing, etc.] team for further investigation. One of our specialists will be reaching out to you within [timeframe] to discuss the matter in more detail and explore potential resolutions.

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us as we continually strive to improve our offerings and deliver exceptional service. Please be assured that we are taking your grievance very seriously and are committed to working with you to find an acceptable solution.

If you have any additional questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to let me know. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Customer Service Representative 
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
